attributes.action: Force Travel agents to reduce prices in school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see the government to force the Travel agents to reduce prices in school holidays and offset prices throughout the year.
It is unfair that the government has implemented fining of people who take their children on holiday in school time.
Certain people may only just be able to afford to go on holiday, but with the travel agents forcing the prices up in school holidays, they have no option, but to take their children in term time

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
